name: Fidget Spinner Monster Hunter
description:
It’s a rescue mission of fidget spinner, best kids’ game. This gives a shimmering chance to kill the unpredictable monsters by dragging and smashing fidget spinner. Hold and drag fidget, hit super villains of respective color that fidget cube emits. As long as you hit monsters of exact color that appears on the spinner, fidget monster is alive. Otherwise super villains will kill the spinner by their terrible weapons and emitting fire. With levelling up, it becomes harder to fight. The number of monsters continuously increase to make this battle more dangerous and interesting.
Features of crazy game are;
Amazing graphics
Sudden change in color of spinner
Killing of monsters with identical color of spinner
Threatening increase of multiple monsters with each level up

Monsters are trying to take over the city as they have weapons of mass destruction. Unleash the power of the spinner, kill rival monsters immediately and get success in this rescue mission. Otherwise they will kill fidget cube with their destructive weapons. Fidget game is waiting for rotator hunt master to take command of the Fidget spinner force and exterminate the super villains. Hurry up! Spin and smash the monsters to win the battle. Enjoy the spinner smash fidget match.

Download and live the fierce fight in the fidget match battle
